COColorsGenerator - Class in color.generator
I am an abstract class defining the protocol for the colors generator Here is the formula used to convert a color into gray scale: 0.3*red + 0.59*green + 0.11*blue
COColorsGenerator() - Constructor for class color.generator.COColorsGenerator
